listitem.para: Create your webpages and your layout.xml file.
Create a skeletal Makefile like this:
listitem.programlisting:
PROC=xslproc STYLEDIR=../xsl TABSTYLE=$(STYLEDIR)/tabular.xsl STYLESHEET=$(TABSTYLE)
# Note: you must set the autolayout-file to a fully qualified path! STYLEOPT="autolayout-file=/full/path/to/autolayout.xml"
.PHONY : clean
all: make website
include depends.tabular
autolayout.xml: layout.xml $(PROC) $< $(STYLEDIR)/autolayout.xsl $@ make depends
%.html: autolayout.xml $(PROC) $(filter-out autolayout.xml,$^) $(STYLESHEET) $@ $(STYLEOPT)
depends: autolayout.xml $(PROC) $< ../xsl/makefile-dep.xsl depends.tabular
listitem.para: You'll have to change the PROC setting and the command-lines used to run the processor.
Create an empty file called depends.tabular.
Run make. That should build your website.
